name: Baseball Camp Performance
description: Dataset with player physical attributes, positions, and performance scores before and after camp training.

columns.name: Height
columns.description: Height of the player in centimeters.

columns.name: Weight
columns.description: Weight of the player in kilograms.

columns.name: Age
columns.description: Age of the player in years.

columns.name: Dominant_Hand
columns.description: Indicates dominant hand of the player (0 = Left, 1 = Right).

columns.name: Position
columns.description: Numeric code representing the player's field position.

columns.name: Pre_Score
columns.description: Performance score of the player before training.

columns.name: Post_Score
columns.description: Performance score of the player after training.

columns.name: Difference
columns.description: Change in performance score after training (Post - Pre).
